I Am Sebas The

I specialize in Web Development

View My Work

I Specialize In

NodeJS as well as ReactJS (Redux) and MongoDB

UI/UX Figma

I think Figma is one of the best tools for working with the prototype, Figma helps you to understand the client without doing the real project yet

ReactJS

I love making reusable components for making a very good project, also I always use Redux state manager when the project is large, and context Hook for small projects

NodeJS

Making the backend is my favorite part, I think nodejs is a great tool for doing all the logic inside a project, but your code can get a bit mess when you want to use OOP

Django

That's why when I want/need to use OOP, my default choose is django, I think django is great for doing the backend part of a project

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

The first step is to create the concept of the project, beside the goal of the main idea

2

UI/UX Figma

Then, when the idea is set, the next step is to start creating a prototype of the final idea, and presenting to the client, this step is super important, because the project will be like the final prototype

3

Starting backend and frontend

I always like to start with the backend, because it defines the model of what will be the project, after that, I make the views of the project with React

4

Final presentation to the client

After the project is done, I always present and make a Handover with the client, in order to present how the project end
